notes.text: We've resolved an issue where the sort icon in the column wasn't functioning correctly
We now support using an absolute path as the target entity for side effects events in a list report
We now update the BreadCrumbs link after data changes
You can now specify a title for the action confirmation dialog
We now allow an action-specific title in the action parameter dialog
We now support semantic coloring for criticality at row level in table integration cards
We've resolved a performance issue that occurred while creating an object in collaborative draft mode
: We've resolved an issue where the Apply Automatically feature for a variant wasn't working correctly after switching to another variant
We now ensure that navigation path binding is not duplicated for the header facets, such as contact, form, and address, on the object page
In InlineCreationRows mode, we now correctly highlight newly created rows in a table
